statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); branch=""; if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then branch=" ($(cd "$current_dir" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null))"; fi; printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m | \033[2m%s\033[0m%s | \033[2m%s\033[0m" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$model" "$branch" "$(date +%H:%M:%S)"
